title: Drawing, "Vanity and Mirror", ca. 1934–35
medium: Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower left: DONALD DESKEY/ 501 MADISON AVENUE/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at center right: Coffee; inscribed in graphite at lower left: 3; inscribed in graphite at lower margin, right: X; lower right in graphite: SCALE 1"-1'0"/6313 [circled]; dimensions and instructions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for narrow vanity and circular mirror. Long, rectangular vanity with tubular metal frame, rounded corners. Top portion of table supported by two glass balls at each edge; frame below of tubular metal. Circular mirror above with frame around lower half of mirror.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Vanity and Mirror", ca. 1934–35.
ca. 1934–35. Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1256.
